channel.title: Client run
channel.description:
i made a client, and now it says this when i run. I used this guide http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,304353.0/topicseen.html, also i changed the thing to his run.bat files :}
[Code] Loading Client... Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: EUGI Caused by: java.land.ClassNotFoundException: EUGI at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPriviledged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)[/code]And so on for a few more lines (it says diff things too) then says Client Loaded, but client doesnt pop up Help plz

item.title: Client run
item.dc:creator: @tehlobbiescape tehlobbiescape
item.description:
@tehlobbiescape wrote:

i made a client, and now it says this when i run. I used this guide http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,304353.0/topicseen.html, also i changed the thing to his run.bat files :}

Loading Client... Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: EUGI Caused by: java.land.ClassNotFoundException: EUGI at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPriviledged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)And so on for a few more lines (it says diff things too) then says Client Loaded, but client doesnt pop up Help plz
